response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its value and quality, we're confident it would be worth $100 to you. Considering this, my offer to you is $95 for the product. I believe this is a fair deal that allows you to benefit from its features while also making room for us to cover our costs and continue providing exceptional products. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 95}
